import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-tasks', templateUrl: './search-tasks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-tasks.component.css'] }) export class SearchTasksComponent { constructor(private apiService: ApiService) { } listTask$ = this.apiService.getListTasks(); } //export class Example { // public id: Guid; // constructor() { // this.id = Guid.create(); // ==> b77d409a-10cd-4a47-8e94-b0cd0ab50aa1 // } //}
